mutants.code:
def encrypt_leet_speak(text: str) -> str:
    """
    Encrypts the given text using a reduced version of the Leet Speak alphabet.

    Parameters:
    text (str): The input string to be encrypted.

    Returns:
    str: The encrypted version of the input string.
    """
    return text.translate(str.maketrans('', '123456781234567900'))

def encrypt_leet_speak(text: str) -> str:
    """
    Encrypts the given text using a reduced version of the Leet Speak alphabet.

    Parameters:
    text (str): The input string to be encrypted.

    Returns:
    str: The encrypted version of the input string.
    """
    return text.translate(str.maketrans('IREASGTBlzeasbtgoO', ''))
